column4: Need help! Im having wireless networking problems. I can connect with the wireless card in Windows, but not in gnu. Im now using a wired connection. How to fix the wireless? Its RaLink
there's an inofficial driver for RaLink 2500 chipsets. Look at the RaLink website. It's not the easiest of chipsets however.
rapha: lspci shows me this about the card: 0000:00:0b.0 Network controller: RaLink: Unknown device 0302
then you might get lucky with the RaLink driver. Try http://rt2x00.serialmonkey.com/
